title: 333. The Most Ambitious Thing Humans Have Ever Attempted
description: Sure, medical progress has been astounding. But today the U.S. spends more on healthcare than any other country, with so-so outcomes. Atul Gawande — cancer surgeon, public-health researcher, and best-selling author — has some simple ideas for treating a painfully complex system.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
